#summary OpenStreetMap is a free, editable map of the world.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =
OpenStreetMap is a free editable map of the whole world. It is made by people like you.

OpenStreetMap allows you to view, edit and use geographical data in a collaborative way from anywhere on Earth.
= More information =
Visit the [http://www.openstreetmap.org/ map].

Read more on the [http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/ wiki].

Chances are there is a group of enthusiastic OpenStreetMappers [http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/index.php/Mapping_projects near you].
